summary: Diff partially addresses Backend Tester behavior by adding scroll/auto-scroll state in SimulatedBashPanel and introducing a per-command `mode: 'live' | 'demo'` field in backendTesterCommands, but the provided changes do not clearly implement the full scrolling acceptance criteria or the required accurate live-vs-demo user-facing messaging.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix the Backend Tester bottom output panel so it reliably scrolls (mouse wheel/trackpad, scrollbar drag, and touch) when command output exceeds the visible height, in both normal and maximized window states; ensure output panel doesn't get stuck due to parent overflow/height constraints; maintain auto-scroll-to-bottom only when user is at bottom.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows new refs/state and an auto-scroll effect, but does not show any concrete container styling/structure changes (e.g., overflow/height constraints) needed to guarantee wheel/drag/touch scrolling in both normal and maximized states, and the auto-scroll logic is truncated so the 'only when at bottom' behavior cannot be verified from the summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the Backend Tester UI and command definitions so messaging accurately reflects live vs demo behavior; clearly indicate which commands are Live vs Demo; ensure banner/note and command list are consistent; remove misleading API-source mentions.
missing_requirements.reason: While a `mode` field was added to `CommandDefinition`, the shown commands are still marked `mode: 'demo'` with descriptions like "Demo mode - uses simulated data" and there is no evidence in the diff summary of Backend Tester UI banner/note text being updated to avoid generic 'demo mode' messaging or to display Live/Demo indicators consistently in the command list.

hallucinated_features.description: Connection monitoring with controlled reconnection attempts (exponential backoff), system outputs, and toast notifications for backend reconnection state in the Backend Tester.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on output scrolling and accurate live-vs-demo messaging; reconnection/backoff/toast behavior is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin-access gating logic commentary/behavior changes in the Backend Tester (e.g., 'Admin access is true ONLY when backend confirms admin AND we're not in limited mode').
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of the requested scrolling or demo/live messaging fixes.
